answers.answer: Well u should  be 41 weeks and no sign  and then u cand judge  us
If u're 41 weeks hell get induce that's not wat I'm saying I'm talking about the ones that r 35-38 weeks that's rushing it geesh!!

What the poster was talking about where the giels who are not due yet so dont juat jump to conclusions.  I get impatient near the end too because ive always had difficult  pregnancys but the crazy thing is i miss being pregnant shortly after. I have a c section  date of dec 31 and been fighting  with my little one to wait till then, mostly because this is my third and last baby so im enjoying it to fullest.
Thanks sabrinaallen at least somebody understands

I understand completely where you are coming from @ trenna_bean....I'm just 30 weeks and have had high risk pregnancies,  in and out of the hospital with hyperemesis,  have lost 83lbs the first pregnancy and so far 45lbs this pregnancy but sick the whole time, can't eat anything other than peaches, can't smell food of any kind except fruit, vomit several times a day because none of the prescribed meds work, tons of fainting spells and taking care of a 16 mth. Old...you would think that I'd want to rush things since I'm miserable but I just want a healthy baby...even if it takes 40+ wks....forget about my hyperemesis,  aches, pains, swelling, lack of sleep, and/or blackouts.  Mothering is and will always be about sacrificing at any cost...especially if it's less than a year...I'm not judging anyone but this is just my personal stance on pregnancy.
I agree with the poster. Be patient and wait for a healthy baby. It will come when it is ready.

@ 1NAMILLION u r so right I hate u had to go thru all that but at least u understand its all worth it at the end. The only thing I'm really dealing wit is this spitting Lord knows I'm ready to get that part over wit I stop early wit my first one this one just taking me all the way I feel like I'm never going stop yes I have all the other symptoms but I dnt let it bother me I just kno it'll be over wit before I kno it

My doctor told me i might have preeclampsia which would mean i can have her full term which i rather do considering asthma runs in my family i wish i could wait till my due date so she healthy and strong id get y would u want ur baby to no be fully formed and induce who cares how u feel its for ur baby good

question: Just wanted to put this out there. It's really sad how some women be in a rush to have their baby and they r doing all these remedies to induce labor or watever bc they tired of being preggo like wats the rush especially the ones being at only 35-38 weeks the point is to go as long as u can unless u're having complications with urself or the baby or the baby just really ready to come on its own maybe it's just me that feel this way I'm 37 weeks today 3cm and want to go full term yes I'm anxious and ready to meet my little bundle of joy but I kno I have to be patient ijs
title: It's call PATIENCE
